message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. Let's split the difference from your offer, considering the money will be worth less next round anyway.
I'll give a bit, but not that much. Meet me closer to the middle.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both don't lose out due to inflation.
